and: Oh, my friend.  Yes, I have many plans.  My family is joining me, to work with me, but even others have seen what we can do, and now I think we have a chance
and.no: .  For a start, I am just working on talking to my fellows about what is next.  I think we need bedrooms, not to sleep in the shared open.  I can do this, easily!  I have some wood, but of course I will need more.  Also I would like to show some others my plans, so we can all agree on how to use the space we have.
